caption.title: Changes in pH, titratable acidity, viable cell counts, and viscosity during fermentation of yogurt supplemented with safflower petal extract.
caption.p: (A, D) pH, (B, E) titratable acidity, (C, F) viable cell counts, and (G, H) viscosity. (A–C) ethanol extracts: •, 0%; ○, 0.1%; ▾, 0.5%; Δ, 1.0%. (D–F) hot water extracts: •, 0%; □, 0.1%; ■, 0.5%; ◊, 1.0%. Different uppercase letters indicate a significant difference (p<0.05).
